mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into refund_picking_details (refund_picking_id, goods_id, quantity, reason) values (#{refundPickingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select refund_picking_details_id, refund_picking_id, goods_id, quantity, reason from refund_picking_details

select rpd.refund_picking_details_id, rpd.refund_picking_id, rpd.goods_id, rpd.quantity, rpd.reason, gd.parts_cd,gd.goods_name,gd.specification,wp.wp_name from refund_picking_details as rpd LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (rpd.goods_id =gd.goods_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse_position AS wp ON (gd.wp_id =wp.wp_id) WHERE rpd.refund_picking_id = #{refundPickingId} and rpd.status = 1

select count(rpd.refund_picking_details_id) from refund_picking_details as rpd LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (rpd.goods_id =gd.goods_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse_position AS wp ON (gd.wp_id =wp.wp_id) WHERE rpd.refund_picking_id = #{refundPickingId} and rpd.status = 1
